name: Would you take the chance?
description:
In this game you'll be repeatedly presented with a reward that comes with a possible penalty. It's your choice if you take the chance on the penalty.

You are encouraged to answer honestly (as if the rewards and penalties were real), or try another approach.

Each time you play the game you'll be presented by these choices, and afterwards you'll unlock achievements based on your outcomes, so trying different approaches on the choices is rewarded.

Controls: Just mouse, point and click, you know how mouses work
